dict.acceptation: 分；划分；分离；（使）产生分歧；

sent.orig: We'll divide up the work (divide the work up) among us.

sent.trans: 肚子疼不分季节，不分早晚。

sent.orig: To divide by 12, the trick is divide by 4 first, then by 3.
sent.trans: 为了完成处理12，我们采用以下技巧，先将数除以4，然后再除以3。

sent.orig: Their cent will divide go dividing not divide evenly, be in so grouse each other, brawl.
sent.trans: 他们分来分去分不匀，所以在互相埋怨、争吵。

sent.orig: Code with a divide-by zero error fails only if you divide by zero.
sent.trans: 只有在被零除的时候，代码才会发生被零除的错误。
